price: 那些市镇的居民多行不义的时候，我毁灭他们，我为他们的毁灭而预定一个期限。
arabic: وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰٓ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهُمۡ لَمَّا ظَلَمُواْ وَجَعَلۡنَا لِمَهۡلِكِهِم مَّوۡعِدٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: watil'ka al-qurā ahlaknāhum lammā ẓalamū wajaʿalnā limahlikihim mawʿidan
